content: next 3 single_crochet around 30 single_crochet round 13-27 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 30 single_crochet total of 15 rounds worked even round 28 decrease single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet around 24 single_crochet round 29 decrease single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet around 18 single_crochet stuff body firmly round 30 decrease single_crochet in next single_crochet around 12 single_crochet round 31 decrease around 6 single_crochet round 32 slip_stitch around as needed to close gap fasten_off and weave in end tentacles chain 4 join with slip_stitch to form ring round 1 chain 3 11 double_crochet in ring 12 double_crochet join with slip_stitch to top of chain 3 round 2 *chain 21 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook and in each chain back to beginning of chain-21 20 single_crochet then slip_stitch in next double_crochet chain 16 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook and each chain back to beginning of chain-16 15 single_crochet slip_stitch in next double_crochet * repeat from * to * around ending with slip_stitch in same space as last slip_stitch of previous round fasten_off leaving a long end to sew tentacles to body assembly and finishing sew the tentacles to the body embroider features or sew on eye/mouth made of buttons felt or assembled from crocheted disks as below big disk chain 4 join with slip_stitch to form ring chain 3 11 double_crochet in ring slip_stitch in top chain of chain 3 to join and finish off leaving a long end to sew eye to body small disk chain 4 join with slip_stitch to form ring 6 single_crochet in ring join with slip_stitch to first single_crochet and fasten_off leaving a long end to sew eye together enjoy your little alien the one eyed little alien crochet pattern is please contact the author at neatlytangled@gmail com thank you
